writer.name: 焦尔采·斯塔夫雷斯基 Gjorce Stavreski

director.name: 焦尔采·斯塔夫雷斯基 Gjorce Stavreski

introduction: A hungry homeless guy breaks into a building basement. His eyes pop out when he sees a tied young lover laying on the floor.Skopje Lovers is a part of SKOPJE REMIXED, a feature omnibus film produced by New Macedonian Video, consisting of 10 love stories, located in Skopje and directed by 10 directors who have graduated from the Faculty of Dramatic Arts in Skopje, Macedonia.For more information you can visit Skopje Remixed’s official twitter and facebook pages.
